results.title: [Intermittent fever of unknown origin].
results.text_hl: INVESTIGATIONS: She had a normochromic normocytic @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Hemolytic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000743 @@@anaemia@@@ and the erythrocyte sedimentation rate and @GENE_CRP @GENE_1401 @@@C-reactive protein@@@ were clearly elevated.
